channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archivist (Neutral Investigative)
channel.description:
# The Archivist (Neutral Investigative)
**Passive 1:** The Archive: You have an archive you can use permanently until dead, but not when hung over, or defending yourself. It contains a list of all people alive and dead and you can add a starting class to each one. *Starting class! Not current class*
**Passive 2:** Truth upon death: When you die your archive will show up correct guesses as green and wrong guesses as red. Your direct killer gets your archive(public execution:First accuser); otherwise it is public(e.g.multiple killers, Hunter, bleed, poison) *This makes your life harder... claiming archivist is a death sentence unless its late game*
**Day Ability 1:Paper of Truth:** Guess the starting class of your first target and send the guess to the second target. It will turn green for the second target if it is correct, otherwise it will turn red.(2 uses) *Great for getting information if this goes public. Not so great for keeping yourself hidden *
**Day Ability 2:Paper of Lies** Guess the starting class of your first target - it can be yourself - and send the guess to the second target. It will turn red for the second target if it is correct, otherwise it will turn green.(2 uses) *No, they can't trust you... you can fake a class for yourself with it tho. And it still gives you info. But.. it announces your presence, ofc.*
**Night Ability 1:Desperate Search** Instantly determine the starting class type and alignment of someone who died last night or day. This will make your presence public(1 use) *"Hmm this person has no valid claim, was assassin, original assassin died D2 and I have no idea who this was" - this is for emergencies such as that one. Plus you cannot be occupied for this one.*
**Night Ability 2:Careful Examination** Examine your archive carefully to determine the number of wrong guesses. If the number is 0 you will publish your archive and be convert immune for the rest of the time.(2 uses) *The number can tell you many things, but you still don't know WHAT is wrong, exactly. Using 2 of them can tell you if a guess is correct or not, however... but you have only 2.*
**Goal**: *Survive, publish a correct archive or have a correct archive upon death* *Yeah survival... not easy to accomplish because no one wants your info in the enemies hands! Completing the archive is a long term task so it will not make a big difference, actually, but you still have to try it(and get a couple more wins)*

item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Almost all abilities make you known so yes the disadvantage is not big. That’s NOT the main point to this ability. The main point to this ability is that no one will want to tell anyone if your guess is correct or not(Paper of Lies or Truth) because there is no high value to it(unless you use it on a defiled target, or on an unknown Soulcatcher while someone claims priest).

item.description:
the other ability’s can make it possible to figure out dead player’s original roles. The desperate search ability doesn’t seem worth using if you aren’t already known to exist and if you are then the disadvantage is meaningless. I would still make it target a living class and give their current role. It isn’t too hard to figure out there starting role from there. If a player is dead then you have effectively already used this ability on that person but now you have they’re journal. That is almost always enough info to figure out what they started as even without the day ability’s

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archivist (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Damafaud:

Ohh a neutral everyone wants to kill.

Me likey.

Why not call it Librarian

Because the Archivist is concerned about the past(original class) and not the present(final/current class)

NuclearBurrito:

I would make desperate search check for a living player’s exact (current) class. I would also remove the survive part of the goal. Knowing everyone’s class is hard enough (unless you ment that if you survive you win even if your archive is wrong). Other than that I like it!

It’s an Or, not an And. Survive OR get your archive right.
It is also not meant as exclusive Or(so you still win with survival and a correct archive)
I do NOT want to change Desperate Search. You have your papers for that(Paper of Lies and Paper of Truth)
